mapper.insert: insert into letter(uid,title,content,email,plan_time) values(#{uid},#{title},#{content},#{email},#{planTime}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title = values(title),content=values(content),email=values(email),plan_time=values(plan_time)
mapper.select: select * from letter where uid = #{uid} and delete_flag=0
mapper.update:
update letter
email=#{email},
content=#{content},
title=#{title},
where id=#{id} and uid =#{uid}
mapper.select:
select l.id, l.create_time as createTime, l.email, l.title, l.content, l.plan_time as planTime, l.post_time as postTime, u.user_name as userName, u.avatar_url as avatarUrl from letter l join user u on u.id = l.uid where l.delete_time is null
and l.plan_time >= current_timestamp
and l.plan_time <= current_timestamp
